summary: REQ-5 is a deployment-retry-only request. The diff adds a branding checklist and a local verification script, but does not show any production deployment retry/configuration changes. The diff summary also indicates multiple unrequested UI/feature changes across the frontend, violating the constraint to avoid new product features or UI changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Retry the production deployment for the latest successful build (Version 33) so production ships the existing branding (title "Dini GC" and correct favicon/apple-touch-icon paths).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows documentation and a local verification script, but no evidence of any deployment pipeline/config changes or actions that would actually retry/resolve the production deployment failure. Acceptance criteria about a successful production deploy cannot be satisfied by the shown changes alone.

hallucinated_features.description: Multiple UI/style changes (palette changes to #cde5aa/white across tokens, removing borders, avatar styling changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Request explicitly constrained to 'deployment retry only' and 'Do not introduce new product features or UI changes'. The diff summary indicates many UI modifications unrelated to deployment retry.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entries for frontend/src/index.css, frontend/src/App.tsx, frontend/src/components/ChatScreen.tsx, frontend/src/components/MessageItem.tsx)

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-5 (which asked to retry deployment). These are auxiliary tooling/docs and constitute additional scope beyond a deployment retry.
